      • showDiff

        public static void showDiff(Project project,
                            FilePath path,
                            VcsFileRevision revision1,
                            VcsFileRevision revision2,
                            java.lang.String title1,
                            java.lang.String title2)
                     throws VcsException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Invokes DiffManager.getDiffTool() to show difference between the given revisions of the given file.
        Parameters:
        project - project under vcs control.
        path - file which revisions are compared.
        revision1 - first revision - 'before', to the left.
        revision2 - second revision - 'after', to the right.
        Throws:
        VcsException
        java.io.IOException

      • showDifferencesInBackground

        public static void showDifferencesInBackground(Project project,
                                               FilePath filePath,
                                               VcsFileRevision older,
                                               VcsFileRevision newer)
        Shows difference between two revisions of a file in a diff tool. The content of revisions is queried in a background thread.
        See Also:
        showDiff(Project, FilePath, VcsFileRevision, VcsFileRevision, String, String)
